nodes.text: Archive droids, also known as archival droids, were droids tasked with collecting and cataloguing archives. At the Graf Archive on Orchis 2, a SP-4 analysis droid named TR-33NA performed that function. At some point, an archival droid consulted with Leia Organa, the former crown princess of Alderaan and the current leader of the Resistance, to write her biography.
